title: Cloud Run WorkerPool (run.googleapis.com/v1)
description: Schema for a Cloud Run WorkerPool manifest (run.googleapis.com/v1, kind=WorkerPool) based on the Cloud Run YAML v1 reference.

apiVersion.description: API version for a Cloud Run WorkerPool in the Cloud Run Admin API v1 YAML representation.

DNSLabel.description: DNS label-like identifier. Cloud Run worker pool names follow Cloud Run naming constraints.

IntOrString.description: A value that may be represented as an integer or a string (useful for YAML/JSON interoperability).

BoolOrString.description: A value that may be represented as a boolean or a string (useful for YAML/JSON interoperability).

ObjectMetaWorkerPool.description: Metadata for the Cloud Run WorkerPool resource.

name.description: Name of the Cloud Run worker pool.

namespace.description: Project number in Cloud Run YAML exports (managed by Cloud Run tooling).

labels.description: WorkerPool resource labels. Cloud Run YAML reference includes 'cloud.googleapis.com/location' for region.

annotations.description: WorkerPool-level annotations supported by Cloud Run YAML v1 reference.

WorkerPoolAnnotations.description: Cloud Run-specific annotations at metadata.annotations for WorkerPool objects.

run.googleapis.com/launch-stage.description: Launch stage gate used to enable preview features.

run.googleapis.com/description.description: Human-readable description of the worker pool.

run.googleapis.com/binary-authorization.description: Binary Authorization policy identifier/config reference for the worker pool.

run.googleapis.com/manualInstanceCount.description: Manual instance count for the worker pool.

instanceSplits.description: Instance split routing rules for the worker pool (similar concept to traffic splits, but for worker pool instances).

WorkerPoolRevisionTemplate.description: Revision template used to create new worker pool revisions.

metadata.description: Metadata for the worker pool revision template.

name.description: Optional explicit revision name. If provided, must follow Cloud Run revision naming rules.

annotations.description: Template annotations for worker pool revisions (spec.template.metadata.annotations).

WorkerPoolTemplateAnnotations.description: Cloud Run-specific annotations for the worker pool revision template.

run.googleapis.com/cloudsql-instances.description: Comma-separated Cloud SQL instance connection names attached to the revision.

run.googleapis.com/vpc-access-egress.description: Egress setting when using VPC networking features on the worker pool.

run.googleapis.com/network-interfaces.description: JSON string describing VPC network settings for Direct VPC egress / network interfaces.

run.googleapis.com/encryption-key.description: CMEK resource name used to encrypt resources for the revision.

run.googleapis.com/container-dependencie.description: Container start ordering/dependencies (multi-container) for the worker pool.

WorkerPoolRevisionSpec.description: Revision spec for the worker pool (runtime configuration).

nodeSelector.description: Node selector constraints (Cloud Run uses this for accelerators).

run.googleapis.com/accelerator.description: GPU/accelerator type selector for the worker pool revision.

serviceAccountName.description: Service account email used by the worker pool revision.

Container.description: Container definition within a worker pool revision.

name.description: Optional container name. Automatically generated if not supplied.

image.description: Container image reference (e.g. Artifact Registry, Docker Hub).

ResourceRequirements.description: Resource requests/limits for the container (Cloud Run primarily uses limits).

VolumeMount.description: Mount a volume into a container filesystem.

mountPath.description: Path inside the container where the volume is mounted.

Volume.description: Volume definition. Cloud Run YAML v1 reference shows secret, emptyDir, CSI (GCS FUSE), and NFS.

name.description: Volume name referenced by container volumeMounts.

KeyToPath.description: Maps a secret key/version to a file path within the mounted volume.

key.description: Secret key (or version identifier in Cloud Run examples).

path.description: Relative file path to project the key to.

secretName.description: Name of the secret to mount.

sizeLimit.description: Maximum size for the emptyDir volume.

CSIVolumeSource.description: CSI volume source (e.g. GCS FUSE on Cloud Run).

driver.description: CSI driver name. Cloud Run GCS FUSE uses 'gcsfuse.run.googleapis.com'.

readOnly.description: Whether the volume is mounted read-only.

bucketName.description: GCS bucket name for GCS FUSE mounts.

mountOptions.description: Comma-separated mount options for GCS FUSE.

readonly.description: Whether the NFS mount is read-only.

InstanceSplit.description: Routes a percentage of instances to a revision (or the latest revision).

percent.description: Percent of instances assigned to this target.

latestRevision.description: If true, assigns instances to the latest ready revision.

revisionName.description: Assigns instances to a specific revision by name.

allOf.description: Either 'latestRevision' must be true OR 'revisionName' must be specified.
